_source.text: Above all he was a great match-winner who surpassed Gavaskar in performances in games won by India.Never did India lose a game when Vishy scored a century.He mastered great fast bowlers like Andy Roberts and Richard Hadlee better than any Indian batsmen ever.His batting exhibitions on a bouncy track against the Calypsos in Madras in 1974 and his 79 and 83 in 1976 in a test in New Zealand were masterpieces of batting unequalled in testing conditions.Above all he championed a crisis.

_source.text: Adding to my point, some people say hunting is bad and killing domestic animals is better, well I am not against killing domestic animals, but I think hunting is good, why? because killing domestic animals is just hunting but your not giving the animal a fair chance and your not giving it the chance to live free for a bit.
